mapper.select: SELECT /* [AuthMapper.chkAuthToken] 사용자 토큰 체크 */ A.AUTH_TOKEN AS authToken , B.ADM_ID AS admId , B.ADM_EMAIL AS admEmail , B.ADM_NAME AS admName , B.ADM_TYPE AS admType FROM AUTH A , API_ADM_INFO B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.ADM_ID AND A.AUTH_TOKEN = #{authToken} AND DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DTM, '%Y%m%d%') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%')
